display_long_description:
ZenInkParty: VR Adventures in a Living Scroll
Unsheathe your controllers—an ancient (shuǐmò) world awaits your touch.

Core Gameplay
Battle, climb, and explore through three handcrafted VR challenges set in a breathtaking ink-wash universe where mountains bleed into clouds and cranes dance like calligraphy strokes:

Cliff of Whispering Winds
Grip your way up ever-changing rockfaces using VR motion controls, where crumbling ink-stone holds force strategic leaps.

Hammer & Vermin
Wield a giant (zhùtiě, cast iron) hammer to smash mischievous ink-rats bursting from rice paper screens.    

Songbird Sanctuary
Load a bamboo slingshot to shoot clay pellets at phantom sparrows terrorizing a Zen garden.

Secrets in the Scroll
Discover two (jīguān, mechanical puzzles) to unlock:


Let's party !
Host 2-16 player sessions where avatars in flowing Hanfu :
Compete in leaderboard challenges (e.g., "Most rats smashed in 60 seconds")


Adaptive grip mechanics for immersive weapon handling

Spatial audio reacts to environment (e.g., climbing winds intensify with height)

Future Horizons
Launching with 3 core stages + 2 secret realms, with quarterly updates adding:

New机关 puzzles (tea ceremony balance challenge confirmed)

Seasonal variants (snowy mountain climb, cherry blossom slingshot arena)

Expanded avatar customization using historic Chinese dyes

Why Players Love It
"Finally, a VR party game where beauty and chaos share the same brushstroke."
– Beta tester review
